txt.en: 'That is their leader! She has been changed by Rûkhor's foul sorceries!'
'You were fools to come here.'
'We now stand in the very heart of Shelob's lair.'
'Bah! I'm tired of waiting! Where are all the spiders?'
'Something approaches in the darkness!'
'You see, the last child of Ungoliant cannot be sated...'
'This is the fate of those who worship Shelob, or seek to ally with her.'
'Aiya Eärendil Elenion Ancalima!'
'Let me out of here! Shagrat is going to pay!'
'What power it once held has faded, but you shall know the wrath of Nenya!'
'All of your strength... all of your power... all of your blood IS MINE!'
'No! Don't let Her... Eat me...'
'Aiya Eärendil! Elenion Ancalima!'
'There is no end to them! What should we do?'
'Though Ungwetári be not slain, never again shall she crawl from the shadows... of Torech Ungol.'
'Shelob called Her children here to FEAST UPON THEM!'
'So hungry... All food is for Mother... But perhaps she will not notice if I just have one....'
'Shelob shall feed upon Middle-earth itself, her vile children shall again spread through its lands, and the terrible offspring of Ungoliant shall endure evermore.'
'What is that horrid stench?'
'Yeeees... Come closer, my little ones... Your deaths will be swift and painless, I promise!'
'You walk into my den willingly? Interesting. I accept your lives as tribute.'
'You?!'
'You think I owe you anything for freeing me?'
'I left you for dead, you miserable [placeholder]!'
'Nar! I won't make that mistake again!'
'Her Ladyship'll get you yet...'
'And you, [placeholder]!'
'You have finally come.'
Defeat Bratha Tasakh, Lady of Many Venoms
Defeat Thossulun the Massive
'...you... and the rest of this world... shall be witness to her wrath!'
'I cannot bear it any longer! I will devour you all!'
Defeat Rûkhor the Pale Herald
'I cannot stand this hunger!'
'It is almost over, now. Shhh.... It will be easier if you hold still!'
'Flies in my webs!'
'Your deaths come in silence.... In Darkness.... I revel in your terror!'
'Ungwetári is defeated... fallen into a prison of her own making....'
'Death and darkness are all that await you here.'
'Bloodless! Attack!'
'In my long life, I have experienced few moments such as this: the weight of a history not yet written.'
Rûkhor the Pale Herald has unveiled his nefarious scheme to you. You must defeat him and his Bloodless captain, Zabothak, to prevent Shelob from being unleashed!
'Ungwetári will hide from the light no longer.'
'Let us hope Ungwetári slumbers still and that our approach has gone unnoticed.'
'We have finally found Mam Murgwid... and I will defend her to my last breath!'
'Did you slay the entire Spider-horde to get this far?'
'Be free, my friend!'
'These webs of shadow shall bind you no longer!'
'...and I will unleash Her upon the world!'
'Ah, my captive audience... It seems I have need of you after all!'
'An unfortunate end....'
'I cannot let such power go to waste!'
'Thank you, my friend.'
The Ungoladan chieftain, Bratha Tasakh, Lady of Many Venoms, bars your path deeper into the Remmorchant.

'We are gathered and prepared, [placeholder]. When you and your allies are ready, we will forge ahead. On your lead, my friend.'\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>NOTE: This quest tracks your progress for the Tier 1 difficulty of the Remmorchant. It allows you and your fellows to resume adventuring in the Remmorchant at the furthest checkpoint you have reached in each weekly cycle. This quest will automatically reset every Monday, Thursday, and Saturday.</rgb>
Thossulun the Massive, daughter of Shelob and Queen of all gredbyg, must be defeated to stem the tide of insects harassing your allies.
'It will not be long... before Shelob wakes from her slumber...'
'Excellent.'
'Aiya Eärendil Elenion Ancalima!'
'These paths are dark and treacherous. Be mindful of your footing, and we shall reunite ahead.'
'Did you think Her a master strategist, forming some secret army beneath the mountains?'
The last challenge is finally upon you: defeat Shelob herself!
'I do not share your impatience, but I am beginning to wonder the same thing....'
'I will make certain nothing remains of you for Shelob to feast upon!'
Defeat Shelob
'Rargh! I will not be defeated by you gutless worms!'
'I hear you, Elf Lord, but I will not listen.'
'Unforgivable, what you did to Felgúr! Filled his head with lies!'
'...and when She finds her children dead... and her larder empty...'
'Tell me, Elf, why did Shelob recall Her children from across Middle-earth?'
'Get out of our way, outsiders!'
'So many dead! What happened here?'
'SPIDERS! COME AND FACE ME!'
'No! Erk... Felgúr.... You were right.... The Ungoledain die with me....'
'Be silent, or every fiend in the Ephel Dúath will be upon us!'
'Go, my friend!'
'Ungwetári is weakened! Strike true, my friend!'
'No, no! I cannot be the last! The Ungoledain will not fall this day!'
'No?'
'There shall be time to mourn yet another people undone by evil, but we cannot delay in our errand.'
'I hear them as well! The Queensbrood whisper to their children and... something else. Something massive.'
'I have no time for this! I will drain this whole place dry and end this NOW!'
'It is over, Zabothak... and you have failed.'
'We must not fail.'
'But... where is she?'
'...and you will go no further!'
'But you have done as I desired since you first set foot in Imlad Morgul!'
Conquering the Remmorchant (Tier 1)
'It seems your wish has been granted, Master Atli. I hear them stirring....'
'You are... too late....'
'You have... bested me, but I have still... triumphed....'
'You cannot hide from the Light of Eärendil, Ungwetári!'
'Rûkhor is here. Be ready.'
'Shelob seeks one thing only, as Her Ladyship always has, and that... is to sate her unending hunger!'
'Another unfortunate delay, but it is no matter.'
'This cannot be! Master, I need more power!'
'Together we have done what I alone could not....'
You have completed the Remmorchant on Tier 1.
'It... is done.'
'Mam Murgwid will not accept weakness!'
'No! Master! Please!'
'Whatever transpires here will ripple across the world, a silent wake in a still pond, and it will be forever changed.'
'If we do not succeed, Ungwetári shall forever plague the peoples of Middle-earth.'
'This will not do. Perhaps this may work....'
'You are wrong, Gúrzyul. There is still hope.'
'And you have made my task far simpler than I ever imagined.'
'The fire will burn you.'
'The shadows will engulf you.'
'You cowardly Orkish filth! Taste my axe!'
'But... I'm afraid I no longer have any use for you.'
'The storm's wrath consume you.'
DNT - On your lead, my friend.
'Nothing will be left but your bones.'
'Erk! We all become... food for Mother....'
'Ack! My... what sharp stings you have... little flies....'
'Unexpected. Death comes... for me?'
'Hope is not lost!'
'It will be your blood if you fail me, Zabothak.'
'Mam Murgwid cares only to eat us! You saw what happened to Felgúr with your own eyes!'
'...is to starve her out!'
'Nooooo!'
'For the Pale Herald!'
'Hear me, Ungoledain! We will spare your lives if you lay down your arms and allow us to pass.'
'Once Shelob's... larder is emptied, I need only wake her from her slumber.'
'Though I have not set foot in this terrible chamber for many long years, its memory shall never leave me.'
'Enough time-wasting! We have spiders to kill!'
'It seems the path diverges. Take whichever you wish, and my company shall take the other.'
'No.'
'You heard those Ungoledain. Felgúr's death in Shelob’s maw has made them question their faith in her!'
'[placeholder], you and your allies must find some way to stem this tide!'
'We will not allow your schemes to bear fruit, Gúrzyul!'
'The Pale Herald has shown me the way....'
'An ambush!'
'Felgúr deserved a better fate. They all did.'
'Rûkhor has betrayed us!'
'Oh no, fool Elf!'
'All I need to do...'
'Hold! Do not advance!'
'Hah! Serves them right for worshipping a spider demon such as she!'
'If you want to stop him, you'll have to get through me!'
'We stand on the precipice of an ancient darkness....'
'Although others might wish it so, I cannot hope to conquer it alone.'
'Traitors! Unworthy of Mam Murgwid! Die, and return your strength to the clan!'
'By your light, Eärendil, brightest of stars, we shall vanquish the darkness!'
'She will not accept traitors!'

Celeborn leads a company of brave adventurers into the depths of the Remmorchant seeking to bring about the final defeat of his ancient foe. Meanwhile, Rûkhor the Pale Herald is enacting his vile plan to unleash the unending hunger of Shelob the Great upon all of Middle-earth.
Completed: Conquering the Remmorchant (Tier 1)
'The others and I will hold the line!'
'These Uruk-hai... they are the Pale Herald's Bloodless.'
'They approach! Ready your weapons!'
'The moment is at hand!'
'Zabothak, kill them.'
'Dead spiders! And not killed by us!'
'Ungwetári awaits.'
'[placeholder], you must stop Rûkhor! We must not fail!
'So be it.'
